article:
Sunday,June 1st                                                   Fine
Great weather today! It's Children's Day . It's also my  fifteenth birthday. My mother decided to have a party for me, so I wrote some _ and sent them to my good friends . I also invited a few on the phone. But Kate said she couldn't come because she had to. visit her aunt, and John said he might  come a little  later.
Ten of my friends came to my home. They _ me nice presents. I liked them very much. The party began  _  six thirty. My friends sang the song " _ birthday to you!" We ate, talked and laughed happily. I feel that I am the happiest girl in the world today. I will  _    forget today.
